      Methods in io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.cloudwatch with parameters of type MetricFilterGroup 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloudWatchMetricsConfig CloudWatchMetricsPluginConfigurer.cloudWatchMetricsConfig(Optional<CloudWatchMetaDataProvider> metaDataProvider, MetricFilterGroup filter)
      Conditionally constructs a new configuration for CloudWatchMetricsPlugin if application doesn't provide its own Bean of CloudWatchMetricsConfig type.
